main_characteristics.title: Turret Head with BMT
content: Our latest milling machine is equipped with an innovative turret head with BMT (Built-in Motor Turret), enabling high-speed tooling machines with speeds of up to 10,000 RPM. This ensures precise and efficient part machining, tailored to the latest industrial standards.

main_characteristics.title: Innovative Lathe with Quick-Change Turret Head
content: Our modern lathe offers high precision thanks to precisely controlled thermal distribution, ensuring optimal working conditions. Additionally, the optional quick-change turret head feature allows for even more efficient production, providing flexibility and performance in part machining.

main_characteristics.title: Energy Saving Settings and Visualization of Savings Effects
content: Our platform focuses on efficient energy savings through precise settings and visualization, allowing users to monitor and optimize energy consumption. This ensures environmentally friendly solutions and reduced operating costs while maintaining high performance and functionality.
